articles.title: Amazon SageMaker HyperPod enhances ML infrastructure with scalability and customizability
articles.description: In this post, we introduced three features in SageMaker HyperPod that enhance scalability and customizability for ML infrastructure. Continuous provisioning offers flexible resource provisioning to help you start training and deploying your models faster and manage your cluster more efficiently. With custom AMIs, you can align your ML environments with organizational security standards and software requirements.
articles.author: Mark Vinciguerra
articles.content: In this post, we introduced three features in SageMaker HyperPod that enhance scalability and customizability for ML infrastructure. Continuous provisioning offers flexible resource provisioning to help you start training and deploying your models faster and manage your cluster more efficiently. With custom AMIs, you can align your ML environments with organizational security standards and software requirements.

articles.title: Claude Sonnet 4 Expands to 1 Million Token Context Window
articles.description: Anthropic has upgraded Claude Sonnet 4 to support a context length of up to 1 million tokens, a fivefold increase over its previous limit. The feature, now in public beta, is accessible through the Anthropic API and Amazon Bedrock, with Google Cloud’s Vertex AI support expected soon. By Robert Krzaczyński
articles.author: Robert Krzaczyński
articles.content: Anthropic has upgraded Claude Sonnet 4 to support a context length of up to 1 million tokens, a fivefold increase over its previous limit. The feature, now in public beta, is accessible through the Anthropic API and Amazon Bedrock, with Google Cloud’s Vertex AI support expected soon. By Robert Krzaczyński

articles.title: OpenAI's GPT-5 Now Generally Available on Microsoft Azure AI Foundry
articles.description: Microsoft and OpenAI launched GPT-5 on the Azure AI Foundry, revolutionizing enterprise AI with its advanced reasoning and task-specific model orchestration. This suite enhances applications like Microsoft 365 Copilot and GitHub Copilot, enabling seamless interactions and high-quality outputs tailored for real-world scenarios. GPT-5 empowers organizations to drive AI transformation efficiently. By Steef-Jan Wiggers
articles.author: Steef-Jan Wiggers
articles.content: Microsoft and OpenAI launched GPT-5 on the Azure AI Foundry, revolutionizing enterprise AI with its advanced reasoning and task-specific model orchestration. This suite enhances applications like Microsoft 365 Copilot and GitHub Copilot, enabling seamless interactions and high-quality outputs tailored for real-world scenarios. GPT-5 empowers organizations to drive AI transformation efficiently. By Steef-Jan Wiggers

articles.title: Traditional AI vs. generative AI: A guide for IT leaders
articles.description: The landscape of artificial intelligence (AI) is evolving at an unprecedented pace, challenging IT leaders to stay ahead of the curve. While traditional AI has quietly powered enterprise operations for decades, the advent of generative AI (GenAI) has reshaped public perception and opened new frontiers. Understanding the core differences, applications, and implementation requirements of these two types of AI is critical for strategic decision making.This blog explores the core differences...
articles.author: The Elastic Platform team

Understanding the core differences, applications, and implementation requirements of these two types of AI is critical for strategic decision making.This blog explores the core differences...

articles.title: A star torn apart by a black hole lit up the Universe twice
articles.description: Astronomers using AI have captured a once-in-a-lifetime cosmic event: a massive star’s violent death triggered by its black hole companion. The explosion, known as SN 2023zkd, not only produced a brilliant supernova but also shocked scientists by glowing twice, after years of strange pre-death brightening. Observed by telescopes worldwide, the event provided the strongest evidence yet that black holes can ignite stellar explosions.
articles.content: Astronomers using AI have captured a once-in-a-lifetime cosmic event: a massive star’s violent death triggered by its black hole companion. The explosion, known as SN 2023zkd, not only produced a brilliant supernova but also shocked scientists by glowing twice, after years of strange pre-death brightening. Observed by telescopes worldwide, the event provided the strongest evidence yet that black holes can ignite stellar explosions.
